text:
I have found a problem with 'jakarta-tomcat-4.0.3-LE-jdk14'.
I defined a JNDI data source in the 
DefailtContext and when I try to use it
into my JSP, the statement
DataSource ds = 
(DataSource) envCtx.lookup("jdbc/testDB");
returns 'null'.
If I use jdk1.3.1_03 with 
tomcat 4.0.1 everything works fine.
creator: mogano70@yahoo.it

text:
Created attachment 2658
jsp with datasource lookup
creator: mogano70@yahoo.it
mogano70@yahoo.it
text:
Created attachment 2659
web.xml of my test application
A simple test lookup works for me using the latest CVS source.
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text:
Looking in more detail at the build scripts, the LE distribution doesn't 
appear to include commons-dbcp.jar or commons-pool.jar both of which are 
required for datasource lookup to work.
